metadata.title: CVE-2021-45909 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in gif2apng 1.9. There is a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the DecodeLZW function. It allows an attacker to write a large amount of arbitrary data outside the boundaries of a buffer.

criterions.comment: gif2apng package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
